title: Tackling the Complexities of Kubernetes Fleet Management
author: Michael Guarino
description: Five key tenets — governance, simplicity, visibility, automation and security — are key to managing a large fleet of Kubernetes clusters effectively.
cntitle: 应对Kubernetes集群管理的复杂性
cndescription: 治理、简洁、可见性、自动化和安全五个关键原则对于有效管理大规模Kubernetes集群至关重要。
